name: Void Rider
description:
Blast off and travel as far as you can in deep space! Orbit around cool planets, stars and satellites to get massive speed boosts.

One last thing before you go: there’s a supermassive blackhole coming to get you. You might want to stay away from that!

Game features:

• 60+ cool skins for your character
• Unique spaceflight gameplay
• Beautiful spacescapes
• Mesmerizing sound effects
